Package net.kuujo.vertigo

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActiveConfig<T extends Config<T>>
    Base live configuration type.
    Config<T extends Config<T>>
    Interface for configuring Vertigo types.
    Context<T extends Context<T>>
    Immutable configuration information for Vertigo types.

    Class Description
    NetworkFactory
    Vertigo network factory.
    NetworkFactory.NetworkVerticle
    Deploys a Vertigo network.
    Vertigo
    The primary Vertigo API.
  • Exception Summary

    VertigoException
    Base Vertigo exception.
